0000	8180	LDH R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0001	7100	LDL R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0002	F010	JSRD #CRYPTO_INIT
0003	F042	JSRD #CRYPTO_GET_DATA_AV
0004	F048	JSRD #CRYPTO_GET_KEY_EXCHANGE
0005	F04E	JSRD #CRYPTO_GET_EOM
0006	D06C	JMPD #FIM
0007	9908	LD R9,R0,R8
0008	8500	LDH R5,SIZE
0009	7550	LDL R5,SIZE
000A	0650	ADD R6,R5,R0
000B	6601	SUBI R6,#01H
000C	1669	SUB R6,R6,R9
000D	E402	JMPZD #INDEX_RESET
000E	5501	ADDI R5,#01H
000F	D001	JMPD #STORE_INDEX
0010	0500	ADD R5,R0,R0
0011	A580	ST R5,R8,R0
0012	B008	RTS
0013	0201	ADD R2,R0,R1
0014	5201	ADDI R2,#01H
0015	0301	ADD R3,R0,R1
0016	5302	ADDI R3,#02H
0017	A010	ST R0,R1,R0
0018	8416	LDH R4,#16H
0019	74FF	LDL R4,#FFH
001A	A420	ST R4,R2,R0
001B	841F	LDH R4,#1FH

001E	8401	LDH R4,#01H
001F	7400	LDL R4,#00H

0021	B008	RTS

0024	0701	ADD R7,R0,R1
0025	5702	ADDI R7,#02H

0028	7400	LDL R4,#00H

002E	76FF	LDL R6,#FFH

0033	5201	ADDI R2,#01H

0043	75FF	LDL R5,#FFH

0045	B008	RTS
